meanings.definition: A performer who uses gestures and facial expressions to convey a story or message.
meanings.sent1: The mimes at the park always make people smile.
meanings.sent2: The mime entertained the crowd with his silent performance.
meanings.sent3: The mime's invisible box routine never fails to amuse the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her expression mimes sadness, even without saying a word.
meanings.sent5: The mime's white face paint and striped shirt make him easily recognizable.
